name: Overgrown (overgrown)
description:
(This is part of a hand-in for an assignment for Plymouth University)

An accident with powerful magic and hoards of plants has left an entire garden in shambles. All of the plants that once were harmless and lifeless are now monstrous and have to be eliminated at all costs before they cause huge damage to the source of protection for the garden, the Tree of Healing who was once your mentor. As a young apprentice spell-slinger, your job is wipe out all of this dangerous vegetation before it is too late for both you and your teacher.
